It is not the strongest or the most intelligent who will survive but those who can best manage change -Charles Darwin

The inspiration for Sortd started in 2014 when as a fledgling Management Consultant, I started to see a pattern in organisations undertaking change – there was a heavy focus on hard factors (ensuring training is organised, implementing new KPI’s, ensuring the organisational structure is correct, etc), but little focus on the soft factors (Employee involvement, top management sponsorship, culture change, etc). This lead me to dive deeper into how these soft factors were managed during periods of change.
